TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi sealed Conversion extends System.Object

summary.span: 模組包含用來執行各種轉換作業的程序。

span.span: The module contains the procedures used to perform various conversion operations.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 這個模組支援的 Visual Basic 語言關鍵字和執行階段程式庫成員，將十進位數字轉換成其他的基底編號，字串、 數字的字串和一個資料輸入到另一個。This module supports the Visual Basic language keywords and run-time library members that convert decimal numbers to other bases, numbers to strings, strings to numbers, and one data type to another. ## Examples 這個範例會使用`Hex`函數來傳回數字的十六進位值。This example uses the `Hex` function to return the hexadecimal value of a number. [!code-vb[VbVbalrStrings#16](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_VBCSharp/VbVbalrStrings/VB/Class1.vb#16)]

MemberSignature.Value: public static object CTypeDynamic (object Expression, Type TargetType);
.method public static object CTypeDynamic(object Expression, class System.Type TargetType) cil managed
Public Function CTypeDynamic (Expression As Object, TargetType As Type) As Object
public: static System::Object ^ CTypeDynamic(System::Object ^ Expression, Type ^ TargetType);

param.name: Expression
param.span: 要轉換的物件。

span.span: The object to convert.

param.name: TargetType
param.span: 要將物件轉換成的型別。

span.span: The type to which to convert the object.

summary.span: 將物件轉換成指定的型別。

span.span: Converts an object to the specified type.

returns.span: 物件，其類型於執行階段為所要求的目標類型。

span.span: An object whose type at run time is the requested target type.

remarks.format: ## Remarks `CTypeDynamic`方法將做為傳遞的物件轉換`Expression`參數所指定的類型`TargetType`參數。The `CTypeDynamic` method converts the object passed as the `Expression` parameter to the type specified by the `TargetType` parameter. 如果物件是動態的物件，`CTypeDynamic`方法適用於可用的動態轉換。If the object is a dynamic object, the `CTypeDynamic` method applies available dynamic conversions. `CTypeDynamic`方法適用於動態轉換根據本身的物件所定義的轉換語意。The `CTypeDynamic` method applies dynamic conversions in accordance with the conversion semantics defined by the object itself. 如果動態的物件會繼承自、`CTypeDynamic`方法第一次嘗試使用使用者定義的靜態轉換執行轉換。If a dynamic object inherits from , the `CTypeDynamic` method first attempts to perform the conversion by using a user-defined, static conversion. 如果使用者定義的靜態轉換失敗，`CTypeDynamic`方法嘗試使用動態轉換執行轉換。If the user-defined, static conversion fails, the `CTypeDynamic` method attempts to perform the conversion by using dynamic conversions. 如果動態物件實作、`CTypeDynamic`方法提供有透過使用者定義的靜態轉換優先順序與動態之間的轉換。If a dynamic object implements , the `CTypeDynamic` method gives precedence to dynamic conversions over user-defined, static conversions. ## Examples 下列範例會使用`CTypeDynamic`使用動態物件所定義的轉換，將動態物件轉換為字串的方法。The following example uses the `CTypeDynamic` method to convert a dynamic object to a string by using the conversion defined by the dynamic object. ```vb Imports System.Dynamic Module Module1 Sub Main() Dim dyn As Object = New SampleDynamicObject Dim sampleString = CTypeDynamic(dyn, GetType(String)) Console.WriteLine(sampleString) End Sub End Module Class SampleDynamicObject Inherits DynamicObject Public Overrides Function TryConvert(ByVal binder As ConvertBinder, ByRef result As Object) As Boolean If binder.Type = GetType(String) Then result = "Sample String" Return True End If Return False End Function End Class ```

remarks.format: ## Remarks `CTypeDynamic`方法將做為傳遞的物件轉換`Expression`泛型參數的型別所指定之類型的參數。The `CTypeDynamic` method converts the object passed as the `Expression` parameter to the type specified by the type of the generic parameter. 如果物件是動態的物件，`CTypeDynamic`方法適用於可用的動態轉換。If the object is a dynamic object, the `CTypeDynamic` method applies available dynamic conversions. `CTypeDynamic`方法適用於動態轉換根據本身的物件所定義的轉換語意。The `CTypeDynamic` method applies dynamic conversions in accordance with the conversion semantics defined by the object itself. 如果動態的物件會繼承自、`CTypeDynamic`方法第一次嘗試使用使用者定義的靜態轉換執行轉換。If a dynamic object inherits from , the `CTypeDynamic` method first attempts to perform the conversion by using a user-defined, static conversion. 如果使用者定義的靜態轉換失敗，`CTypeDynamic`方法嘗試使用動態轉換執行轉換。If the user-defined, static conversion fails, the `CTypeDynamic` method attempts to perform the conversion by using dynamic conversions. 如果動態物件實作、`CTypeDynamic`方法提供有透過使用者定義的靜態轉換優先順序與動態之間的轉換。If a dynamic object implements , the `CTypeDynamic` method gives precedence to dynamic conversions over user-defined, static conversions. ## Examples 下列範例會使用`CTypeDynamic`使用動態物件所定義的轉換，將動態物件轉換為字串的方法。The following example uses the `CTypeDynamic` method to convert a dynamic object to a string by using the conversion defined by the dynamic object. ```vb Imports System.Dynamic Module Module1 Sub Main() Dim dyn As Object = New SampleDynamicObject Dim str = CTypeDynamic(Of String)(dyn) Console.WriteLine(str) End Sub End Module Class SampleDynamicObject Inherits DynamicObject Public Overrides Function TryConvert(ByVal binder As ConvertBinder, ByRef result As Object) As Boolean If binder.Type = GetType(String) Then result = "Sample String" Return True End If Return False End Function End Class ```

Public Function ErrorToString () As String
public: static System::String ^ ErrorToString();

summary.span: 傳回對應到指定錯誤代碼的錯誤訊息。

span.span: Returns the error message that corresponds to a given error number.

returns.span: 對應至最近一次執行階段錯誤的錯誤訊息。

span.span: The error message that corresponds to the most recent run-time error.

remarks.format: ## Remarks `ErrorToString`函式會檢查的屬性設定`Err`來識別最近的執行階段錯誤的物件。The `ErrorToString` function examines the property settings of the `Err` object to identify the most recent run-time error. 傳回值`ErrorToString`函式對應至`Description`屬性`Err`物件。The return value of the `ErrorToString` function corresponds to the `Description` property of the `Err` object. 如果沒有執行階段錯誤，`ErrorToString`傳回零長度字串 ("")。If no run-time error has occurred, `ErrorToString` returns a zero-length string (""). 在 Visual Basic 6.0 或更早版本中提供此功能已`Error`函式。In Visual Basic version 6.0 and earlier, this functionality was provided by the `Error` function. ## Examples 下列程式碼會使用`ErrorToString`函式，以顯示錯誤訊息對應到指定的錯誤號碼。The following code uses the `ErrorToString` function to display error messages that correspond to the specified error numbers. [!code-vb[VbVbalrCatRef#4](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_VBCSharp/VbVbalrCatRef/VB/Class1.vb#4)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks `ErrorToString`函式會檢查的屬性設定`Err`來識別最近的執行階段錯誤的物件。The `ErrorToString` function examines the property settings of the `Err` object to identify the most recent run-time error. 傳回值`ErrorToString`函式對應至`Description`屬性`Err`物件。The return value of the `ErrorToString` function corresponds to the `Description` property of the `Err` object. 如果`ErrorNumber`是有效的錯誤號碼，但未定義`ErrorToString`傳回字串`"Application-defined or object-defined error."`如果`ErrorNumber`不正確，就會發生錯誤。If `ErrorNumber` is a valid error number but is not defined, `ErrorToString` returns the string `"Application-defined or object-defined error."` If `ErrorNumber` is not valid, an error occurs. 如果`ErrorNumber`省略，則對應至最新的訊息就會傳回執行階段錯誤。If `ErrorNumber` is omitted, the message corresponding to the most recent run-time error is returned. 如果沒有執行階段錯誤或`ErrorNumber`為 0，`ErrorToString`傳回零長度字串 ("")。If no run-time error has occurred or `ErrorNumber` is 0, `ErrorToString` returns a zero-length string (""). 在 Visual Basic 6.0 或更早版本中提供此功能已`Error`函式。In Visual Basic version 6.0 and earlier, this functionality was provided by the `Error` function. ## Examples 下列程式碼會使用`ErrorToString`函式，以顯示錯誤訊息對應到指定的錯誤號碼。The following code uses the `ErrorToString` function to display error messages that correspond to the specified error numbers. [!code-vb[VbVbalrCatRef#4](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_VBCSharp/VbVbalrCatRef/VB/Class1.vb#4)]

summary.span: 傳回數字的整數部分。

span.span: Return the integer portion of a number.

returns.span: 傳回數字的整數部分。

span.span: Return the integer portion of a number.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 同時`Int`和`Fix`函式中移除的小數部分`Number`並傳回產生的整數值。Both the `Int` and `Fix` functions remove the fractional part of `Number` and return the resulting integer value. 之間的差異`Int`和`Fix`函式是，如果`Number`是負數，`Int`傳回小於或等於第一個負整數`Number`，而`Fix`傳回第一個負整數大於或等於`Number`。The difference between `Int` and `Fix` functions is that if `Number` is negative, `Int` returns the first negative integer less than or equal to `Number`, whereas `Fix` returns the first negative integer greater than or equal to `Number`. 例如， `Int` -9，會將-8.4 和`Fix`-8.4 將-8。For example, `Int` converts -8.4 to -9, and `Fix` converts -8.4 to -8. `Fix(number)` 相當於 `Sign(number) * Int(Abs(number)).``Fix(number)` is equivalent to `Sign(number) * Int(Abs(number)).` ## Examples 此範例說明如何`Int`和`Fix`函式會傳回數字的整數部分。This example illustrates how the `Int` and `Fix` functions return integer portions of numbers. 如果引數為負，`Int`函式會傳回第一個負整數小於或等於數字，`Fix`函式會傳回第一個負整數，大於或等於數字。In the case of a negative number argument, the `Int` function returns the first negative integer less than or equal to the number; the `Fix` function returns the first negative integer greater than or equal to the number. 下列範例要求您指定`Option Strict Off`因為類型的隱含地轉換`Double`輸入`Integer`下，不允許`Option Strict On`:The following example requires you to specify `Option Strict Off` because implicit conversions from type `Double` to type `Integer` are not allowed under `Option Strict On`: [!code-vb[VbVbalrMath#4](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_VBCSharp/VbVbalrMath/VB/Class2.vb#4)] 您可以使用`CInt`函式，明確地將其他資料類型轉換成類型`Integer`與`Option Strict Off`。You can use the `CInt` function to explicitly convert other data types to type `Integer` with `Option Strict Off`. 不過，`CInt`四捨五入為最接近的整數，而非截斷數字的小數部分。However, `CInt` rounds to the nearest integer instead of truncating the fractional part of numbers. 例如: For example: [!code-vb[VbVbalrMath#5](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_VBCSharp/VbVbalrMath/VB/Class1.vb#5)] 您可以使用`CInt`函式呼叫的結果上`Fix`或`Int`執行而不需四捨五入成整數的明確轉換。You can use the `CInt` function on the result of a call to `Fix` or `Int` to perform explicit conversion to integer without rounding. 例如: For example: [!code-vb[VbVbalrMath#6](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_VBCSharp/VbVbalrMath/VB/Class1.vb#6)] 如需有關`CInt`，請參閱[類型轉換函式](~/docs/visual-basic/language-reference/functions/type-conversion-functions.md)。For more information on `CInt`, see [Type Conversion Functions](~/docs/visual-basic/language-reference/functions/type-conversion-functions.md).

remarks.format: ## Remarks 同時`Int`和`Fix`函式中移除的小數部分`Number`並傳回產生的整數值。Both the `Int` and `Fix` functions remove the fractional part of `Number` and return the resulting integer value. 之間的差異`Int`和`Fix`函式是，如果`Number`是負數，`Int`傳回小於或等於第一個負整數`Number`，而`Fix`傳回第一個負整數大於或等於`Number`。The difference between `Int` and `Fix` functions is that if `Number` is negative, `Int` returns the first negative integer less than or equal to `Number`, whereas `Fix` returns the first negative integer greater than or equal to `Number`. 例如， `Int` -9，會將-8.4 和`Fix`-8.4 將-8。For example, `Int` converts -8.4 to -9, and `Fix` converts -8.4 to -8. `Fix(number)` 相當於 `Sign(number) * Int(Abs(number)).``Fix(number)` is equivalent to `Sign(number) * Int(Abs(number)).` ## Examples 此範例說明如何`Int`和`Fix`函式會傳回數字的整數部分。This example illustrates how the `Int` and `Fix` functions return integer portions of numbers. 如果引數為負，`Int`函式會傳回第一個負整數小於或等於數字，`Fix`函式會傳回第一個負整數，大於或等於數字。In the case of a negative number argument, the `Int` function returns the first negative integer less than or equal to the number; the `Fix` function returns the first negative integer greater than or equal to the number. 下列範例要求您指定`Option Strict Off`因為類型的隱含地轉換`Double`輸入`Integer`下，不允許`Option Strict On`:The following example requires you to specify `Option Strict Off` because implicit conversions from type `Double` to type `Integer` are not allowed under `Option Strict On`: [!code-vb[VbVbalrMath#4](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_VBCSharp/VbVbalrMath/VB/Class2.vb#4)] 您可以使用`CInt`函式，明確地將其他資料類型轉換成類型`Integer`與`Option Strict Off`。You can use the `CInt` function to explicitly convert other data types to type `Integer` with `Option Strict Off`. 不過，`CInt`四捨五入為最接近的整數，而非截斷數字的小數部分。However, `CInt` rounds to the nearest integer instead of truncating the fractional part of numbers. 例如: For example: [!code-vb[VbVbalrMath#5](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_VBCSharp/VbVbalrMath/VB/Class1.vb#5)] 您可以使用`CInt`函式呼叫的結果上`Fix`或`Int`執行而不需四捨五入成整數的明確轉換。You can use the `CInt` function on the result of a call to `Fix` or `Int` to perform explicit conversion to integer without rounding. 例如: For example: [!code-vb[VbVbalrMath#6](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_VBCSharp/VbVbalrMath/VB/Class1.vb#6)] 如需有關`CInt`，請參閱[類型轉換函式](~/docs/visual-basic/language-reference/functions/type-conversion-functions.md)。For more information on `CInt`, see [Type Conversion Functions](~/docs/visual-basic/language-reference/functions/type-conversion-functions.md).

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果`Number`還不是整數，它會計算前捨入到最接近的整數。If `Number` is not already a whole number, it is rounded to the nearest whole number before being evaluated. |如果`Number`是If `Number` is|Hex 會傳回Hex returns| |-|-| |EmptyEmpty|零 (0)Zero (0)| |任何數值Any numeric value|最多 16 個十六進位字元Up to sixteen hexadecimal characters| 您可以直接由數字之前在適當的範圍，以表示十六進位數字`&H`。You can represent hexadecimal numbers directly by preceding numbers in the proper range with `&H`. 例如，`&H10`表示十進位 16 的十六進位表示法。For example, `&H10` represents decimal 16 in hexadecimal notation. ## Examples 這個範例會使用`Hex`函數來傳回數字的十六進位值。This example uses the `Hex` function to return the hexadecimal value of a number. summary.span: 傳回數字的整數部分。

span.span: Return the integer portion of a number.

returns.span: 傳回數字的整數部分。

span.span: Return the integer portion of a number.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 同時`Int`和`Fix`函式中移除的小數部分`Number`並傳回產生的整數值。Both the `Int` and `Fix` functions remove the fractional part of `Number` and return the resulting integer value. 之間的差異`Int`和`Fix`函式是，如果`Number`是負數，`Int`傳回小於或等於第一個負整數`Number`，而`Fix`傳回第一個負整數大於或等於`Number`。The difference between `Int` and `Fix` functions is that if `Number` is negative, `Int` returns the first negative integer less than or equal to `Number`, whereas `Fix` returns the first negative integer greater than or equal to `Number`. 例如， `Int` -9，會將-8.4 和`Fix`-8.4 將-8。For example, `Int` converts -8.4 to -9, and `Fix` converts -8.4 to -8. `Fix(number)` 相當於 `Sign(number) * Int(Abs(number)).``Fix(number)` is equivalent to `Sign(number) * Int(Abs(number)).` ## Examples 此範例說明如何`Int`和`Fix`函式會傳回數字的整數部分。This example illustrates how the `Int` and `Fix` functions return integer portions of numbers. 如果引數為負，`Int`函式會傳回第一個負整數小於或等於數字，`Fix`函式會傳回第一個負整數，大於或等於數字。In the case of a negative number argument, the `Int` function returns the first negative integer less than or equal to the number; the `Fix` function returns the first negative integer greater than or equal to the number. 下列範例要求您指定`Option Strict Off`因為類型的隱含地轉換`Double`輸入`Integer`下，不允許`Option Strict On`:The following example requires you to specify `Option Strict Off` because implicit conversions from type `Double` to type `Integer` are not allowed under `Option Strict On`: [!code-vb[VbVbalrMath#4](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_VBCSharp/VbVbalrMath/VB/Class2.vb#4)] 您可以使用`CInt`函式，明確地將其他資料類型轉換成類型`Integer`與`Option Strict Off`。You can use the `CInt` function to explicitly convert other data types to type `Integer` with `Option Strict Off`. 不過，`CInt`四捨五入為最接近的整數，而非截斷數字的小數部分。However, `CInt` rounds to the nearest integer instead of truncating the fractional part of numbers. 例如: For example: [!code-vb[VbVbalrMath#5](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_VBCSharp/VbVbalrMath/VB/Class1.vb#5)] 您可以使用`CInt`函式呼叫的結果上`Fix`或`Int`執行而不需四捨五入成整數的明確轉換。You can use the `CInt` function on the result of a call to `Fix` or `Int` to perform explicit conversion to integer without rounding. 例如: For example: [!code-vb[VbVbalrMath#6](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_VBCSharp/VbVbalrMath/VB/Class1.vb#6)] 如需有關`CInt`，請參閱[類型轉換函式](~/docs/visual-basic/language-reference/functions/type-conversion-functions.md)。For more information on `CInt`, see [Type Conversion Functions](~/docs/visual-basic/language-reference/functions/type-conversion-functions.md).

remarks.format: ## Remarks 同時`Int`和`Fix`函式中移除的小數部分`Number`並傳回產生的整數值。Both the `Int` and `Fix` functions remove the fractional part of `Number` and return the resulting integer value. 之間的差異`Int`和`Fix`函式是，如果`Number`是負數，`Int`傳回小於或等於第一個負整數`Number`，而`Fix`傳回第一個負整數大於或等於`Number`。The difference between `Int` and `Fix` functions is that if `Number` is negative, `Int` returns the first negative integer less than or equal to `Number`, whereas `Fix` returns the first negative integer greater than or equal to `Number`. 例如， `Int` -9，會將-8.4 和`Fix`-8.4 將-8。For example, `Int` converts -8.4 to -9, and `Fix` converts -8.4 to -8. `Fix(number)` 相當於 `Sign(number) * Int(Abs(number)).``Fix(number)` is equivalent to `Sign(number) * Int(Abs(number)).` ## Examples 此範例說明如何`Int`和`Fix`函式會傳回數字的整數部分。This example illustrates how the `Int` and `Fix` functions return integer portions of numbers. 如果引數為負，`Int`函式會傳回第一個負整數小於或等於數字，`Fix`函式會傳回第一個負整數，大於或等於數字。In the case of a negative number argument, the `Int` function returns the first negative integer less than or equal to the number; the `Fix` function returns the first negative integer greater than or equal to the number. 下列範例要求您指定`Option Strict Off`因為類型的隱含地轉換`Double`輸入`Integer`下，不允許`Option Strict On`:The following example requires you to specify `Option Strict Off` because implicit conversions from type `Double` to type `Integer` are not allowed under `Option Strict On`: [!code-vb[VbVbalrMath#4](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_VBCSharp/VbVbalrMath/VB/Class2.vb#4)] 您可以使用`CInt`函式，明確地將其他資料類型轉換成類型`Integer`與`Option Strict Off`。You can use the `CInt` function to explicitly convert other data types to type `Integer` with `Option Strict Off`. 不過，`CInt`四捨五入為最接近的整數，而非截斷數字的小數部分。However, `CInt` rounds to the nearest integer instead of truncating the fractional part of numbers. 例如: For example: [!code-vb[VbVbalrMath#5](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_VBCSharp/VbVbalrMath/VB/Class1.vb#5)] 您可以使用`CInt`函式呼叫的結果上`Fix`或`Int`執行而不需四捨五入成整數的明確轉換。You can use the `CInt` function on the result of a call to `Fix` or `Int` to perform explicit conversion to integer without rounding. 例如: For example: [!code-vb[VbVbalrMath#6](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_VBCSharp/VbVbalrMath/VB/Class1.vb#6)] 如需有關`CInt`，請參閱[類型轉換函式](~/docs/visual-basic/language-reference/functions/type-conversion-functions.md)。For more information on `CInt`, see [Type Conversion Functions](~/docs/visual-basic/language-reference/functions/type-conversion-functions.md).

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果`Number`還不是整數，它會計算前捨入到最接近的整數。If `Number` is not already a whole number, it is rounded to the nearest whole number before being evaluated. |如果數字為If Number is|傳回的八進位Oct returns| |-|-| |EmptyEmpty|零 (0)Zero (0)| |其他任何數字Any other number|最多 22 八進位字元Up to 22 octal characters| 您可以直接由數字之前在適當的範圍，以表示八進位數字`&O`。You can represent octal numbers directly by preceding numbers in the proper range with `&O`. 例如，`&O10`是十進位 8 八進位標記法。For example, `&O10` is the octal notation for decimal 8. ## Examples 這個範例會使用`Oct`函數來傳回數字的八進位值。This example uses the `Oct` function to return the octal value of a number. remarks.format: ## Remarks 當數字轉換為字串時，前置空格一定會保留正負號的`Number`。When numbers are converted to strings, a leading space is always reserved for the sign of `Number`. 如果`Number`為正數，傳回的字串包含空格，而且加號會隱含。If `Number` is positive, the returned string contains a leading space, and the plus sign is implied. 減號 （-），且沒有前置空格，就會包含為負數。A negative number will include the minus sign (-) and no leading space. 使用`Format`將您要格式化為日期、 時間、 貨幣或其他使用者定義格式的數值轉換成函式。Use the `Format` function to convert numeric values you want formatted as dates, times, or currency or in other user-defined formats. 不同於`Str`函式，`Format`函式不會加上正負號的前置空格`Number`。Unlike the `Str` function, the `Format` function does not include a leading space for the sign of `Number`. > [!NOTE] > `Str`函式只會將句點 (`.`) 做為有效的十進位分隔符號。The `Str` function recognizes only the period (`.`) as a valid decimal separator. 如果使用不同的十進位分隔符號 （例如，在國際應用程式），使用`CStr`或`Format`函式來將數字轉換為字串。If different decimal separators are used (for example, in international applications), use the `CStr` or `Format` functions to convert a number to a string. 若要取得特定文化特性中的數字的字串表示，使用數字的`ToString(IFormatProvider)`方法。To get the string representation of a number in a particular culture, use the number's `ToString(IFormatProvider)` method. 例如，使用轉換類型的值時`Double`為字串。For example, use when converting a value of type `Double` to a string. ## Examples 這個範例會使用`Str`函數來傳回`String`數字表示。This example uses the `Str` function to return a `String` representation of a number. 當的正數值轉換為字串時，一定會為正負號保留前置空格。When a positive number is converted to a string, a leading space is always reserved for its sign. [!code-vb[VbVbalrStrings#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_VBCSharp/VbVbalrStrings/VB/Class1.vb#1)]

span.span: Returns the numbers contained in a string as a numeric value of appropriate type.

remarks.format: ## Remarks `Val`函式停止讀取第一個字元無法辨識為數字部分的字串。The `Val` function stops reading the string at the first character it cannot recognize as part of a number. 無法辨識符號和通常被視為數值，例如貨幣符號和逗號，部分的字元。Symbols and characters that are often considered parts of numeric values, such as dollar signs and commas, are not recognized. 不過，此函式會辨識基數前置詞`&O`(如八進位) 和`&H`（針對十六進位方式）。However, the function recognizes the radix prefixes `&O` (for octal) and `&H` (for hexadecimal). 空格、 定位點和換行字元都會從引數。Blanks, tabs, and linefeed characters are stripped from the argument. 下列呼叫會傳回 1615198 的值。The following call returns the value 1615198. ``` Val(" 1615 198th Street N.E.") ``` 下列呼叫會傳回-1 的十進位值。The following call returns the decimal value -1. ``` Val("&HFFFF") ``` > [!NOTE] > `Val`函式只會將句點 (`.`) 做為有效的十進位分隔符號。The `Val` function recognizes only the period (`.`) as a valid decimal separator. 當使用不同的小數分隔符號時，如同國際化應用程式，使用`CDbl`或`CInt`改為將字串轉換成數字。When different decimal separators are used, as in international applications, use `CDbl` or `CInt` instead to convert a string to a number. 若要將特定文化特性之數字的字串表示轉換為數值，使用 數值類型之`Parse(String, IFormatProvider)`方法。To convert the string representation of a number in a particular culture to a numeric value, use the numeric type's `Parse(String, IFormatProvider)` method. 例如，使用字串轉換成`Double`。For example, use when converting a string to a `Double`. > [!NOTE] > 可能在某些罕見的數字格式的回應中引發例外狀況。An exception might be raised in response to certain uncommon number formats. 例如，下列程式碼會引發這個例外狀況。For example, the following code raises this exception. > > `' These examples cause run-time errors.` > > `'Console.WriteLine(Val("1.34%"))` > > `'Console.WriteLine(Val("1.34&"))` > > 數字之間的衝突格式化為`Double`和`Integer`和`Long`會由編譯器所攔截類型字元，如果它未包含在字串中。The conflict between the number formatted as a `Double` and the `Integer` and `Long` type characters would be caught by the compiler if it were not contained in a string. > > `' These examples cause compiler errors.` > > `'Dim m = 1.34%` > > `'Dim n = 1.34&` ## Examples 下列範例會使用`Val`函數來傳回每個字串中包含的數字。The following example uses the `Val` function to return the numbers contained in each string. `Val` 停止在無法解譯為數字、 數字的修飾詞、 數字的標點符號或泛空白字元的第一個字元轉換。`Val` stops converting at the first character that cannot be interpreted as a numeric digit, numeric modifier, numeric punctuation, or white space.
